text: LatinNews (Latin American Newsletters) provides news services relating to Latin America. Its major publications include the Latin American Weekly Report (weekly), Latin American Economy and Business (monthly) and Latinnews Daily (daily).LatinNews, About us ==References== Category:News agencies based in the United Kingdom Category:Publishing companies established in 1967 Category:Companies based in the London Borough of Camden Category:1967 establishments in England
title: LatinNews
